text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
text.Response A: The Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is a great way to decorate your garden space while also being functional. This weathervane is made of 14 gauge steel, has sealed ball bearings in the wind cup for easy movement, and comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. The flag design is finished with an antique copper finish for a stylish look. This weathervane is garden mount only.
text.Response B: Behold the Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings! This awe-inspiring piece is a high-quality, non-glossy photo paper reprint of an 1892 original. Measuring 16 x 24 inches, this poster is sure to make a statement in any room. Perfect for those who love magic, history, or just plain old-fashioned charm, this poster is a must-have addition to your home decor. So, why wait? Order yours today and experience the magic for yourself!

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

24.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only

Response A

The Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is a great way to decorate your garden space while also being functional. This weathervane is made of 14 gauge steel, has sealed ball bearings in the wind cup for easy movement, and comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. The flag design is finished with an antique copper finish for a stylish look. This weathervane is garden mount only.

Response B

Behold the Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings! This awe-inspiring piece is a high-quality, non-glossy photo paper reprint of an 1892 original. Measuring 16 x 24 inches, this poster is sure to make a statement in any room. Perfect for those who love magic, history, or just plain old-fashioned charm, this poster is a must-have addition to your home decor. So, why wait? Order yours today and experience the magic for yourself!
